title: 我的世界：地球 6月2日更新公告
author: Sinbad_Official
txt_content:
Minecraft Earth R19 Patch Notes –  June 2, 2020我的世界：地球 R19补丁更新公告 — 2020年6月2日New Stuff! 新东西！A new Challenge awaits! Challenge Season 3: "Adventure" is now available – complete all the Challenges and unlock great new items for your character!新的挑战恭候你的到来！挑战 赛季3:“冒险”已解锁——完成所有挑战来为你的角色解锁新物品！

Adventure Crystals:
冒险水晶：Find new, amazing Epic Adventure Crystals! If you’re up for an adventure of epic proportions, get ready to take on the Epic Adventure crystals! These are now available as well as new crystals of all rarities!探索新的，史诗级别的冒险水晶吧！如果你想参与一场史诗级面积大小的冒险的话，获取史诗级冒险水晶吧！现在这些水晶已经解锁，并且还有许多新的稀有的冒险水晶！Have an empty Adventure Crystal slot? Fear not! You can now tap the slot to find out how to obtain more crystals!有一个空下来的冒险水晶槽位？别担心！你现在可以点击这个槽位来咨询如何获得更多水晶了！

New Mobs & Variants:
新生物&变种： Find the latest EWE-nique sheep to join the herd, Inky Sheep!寻找到最新的羊来加入到你的团伙吧，墨水羊！
Have a hopping good time finding the new Harelequin Rabbit! Yep, you read that right, HARE! Because, you know, it’s a rabbit!在寻找多彩兔的旅途上享受一段美好时光吧！是的，你没看错，是野兔！因为，你知道的，它是个兔子。

Bug Fixes:
Bug修复：
Various bug fixes!各种bug修复！

Et Cetera!
还有更多！Things just got more a-peel-ing! You should now be able to find apples more often!事态变得更平——稳——了！你现在可以找到更多的苹果了！Concrete and concrete powder are now available (starting Thursday 6/4)!从6月4号起，你就可以买到混凝土和混凝土粉末了！Exciting new customizations can be found in journal rewards for collecting 5 rabbits and 5 sheep!你可以通过收集5只兔子以及5只羊来获取刺激的奖励！
